FamilyMemberBusinessWithEthicsList.Description: Pres. Trump resigned his position from Ace Entertainment Holdings Inc. (F/K/A Trump Casinos, F/K/A Inc. Trump Taj Mahal, Inc.), which is reportedly dormant or inactive. However, he retains an ownership interest.
